Camphill Village West Coast's Country Butter Rusks (500g) is sustainably-sourced and made by a local community for intellectually-challenged adults.

Ingredients 

Stone-ground wheat flour, farm cultured milk, farm butter, sugar, bran 16%, oats, coconut, free range eggs, sunflower seeds, linseeds, sesame seeds, pumpkin seeds, baking powder, salt.

Why we support Camphill Village

The revenue that is made from these sales goes towards sustaining Camphill Village West Coast. Camphill Village cares about the environment, sustainability and future generations to come!

Camphill Village West Coast is a sustainable, socially-uplifting community established for intellectually challenged adults, to provide them with the opportunity to live with purpose and dignity. Located on a farm (40 km north of Cape Town), Camphill is set in a natural farm setting where the residents work in a bakery, dairy, herbal workshop, farm and vegetable gardens to produce quality goods for sale.

entry.title: Baltic Amber Teething Necklace (Mixed)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baltic Amber for Africa
Type: Baby
Price: 146.50

Baltic Amber For Africa's Mixed Teething Necklace naturally soothes the symptoms of teething and irritability.

  • Carefully crafted using a mix of four different colours of Amber beads
  • Design feature to protect against choking if the necklace is pulled hard
  • As an additional safety feature, there is a knot before and after each bead so that in the event of it being broken, there is no risk of choking on the beads
  • Naturally soothes sore and swollen gums without the use of medication
  • Reduces inflammation and clears red cheeks
  • Reduces drooling and calms irritability
  • Improves sleep and boosts immunity 

How can an amber teething necklace help your teething baby?

Baltic amber has been used for thousands of years for its beauty and healing properties. Although the exact process of how Baltic Amber aids against inflammation and pain is unclear, it is thought that when Baltic amber warms against the skin, it creates an electromagnetic field and releases succinic acid, a natural healing oil that aids against inflammation and pain. This makes Baltic amber the perfect natural solution to help teething babies with sore and swollen gums, without the use of medication!

Ancient people believed that Baltic amber would give courage to the wearer, ward off evil spirits, protect against disease, strengthen the human spirit and purify the soul. To this day Baltic amber is believed to have spiritual properties that provide psychic protection and aid manifestations.

Baltic amber is also referred to as an Adaptogen, which aids in the body's ability to deal with changes in the environment and stress. 

Directions for use

Baltic amber teething necklaces are suitable for babies from 8 weeks and older and are safe for use during the day or the night. You can start using an amber teething necklace even before your baby starts teething. This will help your baby to become comfortable with the necklace and the sooner your baby starts wearing the necklace, the less likely he or she will be to tug on it. Your baby will also be able to immediately benefit from the healing and protective properties of the amber. 

The necklace is worn around your baby's neck and the beads are NOT for chewing and sucking! The healing and pain relieving process takes place when the amber beads warm against your baby's skin.

Do not use harsh detergents on your Baltic amber teething necklace. Simply rinse with warm water to clean and dry with a soft dry cloth. You can also rub the beads with a little olive oil to restore shine if needed. 

Please note: Due to the nature of this product, each amber teething necklace is slightly different - no two are exactly the same!

entry.title: Baltic Amber Necklace for ADHD Children
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baltic Amber for Africa
Type: ADHD
Price: 190.00

Baltic Amber for Africa's ADHD Necklace aids concentration and inner-peace in people who suffer from Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD).

  • This amber and gemstone necklace aids concentration and brings a sense of inner calm and groundedness
  • The crystals also ease other difficulties which may be associated with ADHD such as anxiety, depression, upset or anger
  • Carefully crafted using Cognac Amber, Smokey Quartz, Sodalite and Fluorite
  • Smokey Quartz helps you to feel grounded and is beneficial in times of stress. Smokey quartz helps to instill feelings of calmness and aids in releasing fear, especially when this is linked to failure. The grounding properties of this stone help ease hyperactivity and staying on task.
  • Sodalite helps to clear mental confusion and restore inner peace that has been disrupted. It encourages effective communication and calms the mind, increasing it’s ability to take in and process new information and focus.
  • Fluorite is said to absorb and neutralize all negative energies and is also known as the “Genius Stone,” as it increases concentration and helps in decision-making. Fluorite clears your mind of confusion, cluttered
    thoughts and negativity. Fluorite heightens mental abilities, assisting in rapid organisation and processing of information.
  • Design feature to protect against choking if the necklace is pulled hard
  • As an additional safety feature, there is a knot before and after each bead so that in the event of it being broken, there is no risk of choking on the beads
  • Circumference size: 36 cm

How can an amber necklace help those with ADHD?

Baltic amber has been used for thousands of years for its beauty and healing properties. Although the exact process is unclear of how Baltic Amber is therapeutic, it is thought that when Baltic amber warms against the skin, it creates an electromagnetic field and releases succinic acid, a natural healing oil that aids against inflammation, discomfort and pain. This makes Baltic amber the perfect natural solution to help those struggling with ADHD!

Ancient people believed that Baltic amber would give courage to the wearer, ward off evil spirits, protect against disease, strengthen the human spirit and purify the soul. To this day Baltic amber is believed to have spiritual properties that provide psychic protection and aid manifestations.

Baltic amber is also referred to as an Adaptogen, which aids in the body's ability to deal with changes in the environment and stress. 

Directions for use

The necklace is worn around your neck and the beads are NOT for chewing and sucking! The healing and stress relieving process takes place when the amber beads warm against your skin.

Do not use harsh detergents on your Baltic amber ADHD necklace. Simply rinse with warm water to clean and dry with a soft dry cloth. You can also rub the beads with a little olive oil to restore shine if needed. 

Please note: Due to the nature of this product, each amber necklace is slightly different - no two are exactly the same!

entry.title: FLAXi Heat Therapy Bags (Pack of 8 Mixed Designs) - SAVE 10%
entry.summary:
Vendor: FLAXi Bag
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 893.00

FLAXi's Heat Therapy Bags (pack of 8 mixed designs) are beautiful 100% cotton hand printed heat therapy bag for aches and pains.

  • 1 x Royal Blue Dots design, 1 x Red Orange Dots design, 1 x Chartreuse Green Dots design, 1 x Charcoal Dots design, 1 x Royal Blue Foliage design, 1 x Red Orange Foliage design, 1 x Chartreuse Green Foliage design, 1 x Charcoal Foliage design
  • Natural heat therapy bags for aches and pains
  • Provides targeted pain relief for conditions such as arthritis, muscular pain, PMS, back pain, restless leg syndrome, tension, fibromyalgia, rheumatic disease, headaches and more
  • Bags made from natural cotton, hand-crafted in South Africa
  • Designed for use as a hot or cold compress (microwavable/chill it in the freezer for a cold compress)
  • Retains heat for up to 40 minutes at a time
  • Filled with food-grade Flaxseed and organic Cape Lavender

How to use

Heat Therapy: Place your FLAXi Bag in the microwave on high for 2 minutes, and place the bag over the affected area.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, remove the external bag and gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.

entry.title: Flaxseed & Lavender Heat Therapy Bag (Aqua Sheep) | FLAXiToddler
entry.summary:
Vendor: FLAXi Bag
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 90.00

FLAXi's Aqua Sheep Heat Therapy Bag is a beautifully 100% cotton flannel hand printed heat therapy bag for toddlers' bumps, bruises, growing pains, fevers and sleep issues.

  • Natural heat therapy bag for aches and pains
  • Removable and washable cover
  • Bag made from 100% natural cotton flannel inner bag filled with linseed and lavender, hand-crafted in South Africa
  • Designed for use as a hot or cold compress (microwavable/chill it in the freezer for a cold compress)
  • Retains heat for up to 40 minutes at a time
  • Filled with food-grade Flaxseed and organic Cape Lavender
  • Size: 100x200mm

How to use

Heat Therapy: Place your FLAXi Bag in the microwave on high for 2 minutes, and place the bag over the affected area.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, remove the external bag and gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.
